title: Supreme Court Dives Into Culture-War Clashes
itunes:title: Supreme Court Dives Into Culture-War Clashes
description:
Greg Stohr, Bloomberg News Supreme Court Reporter, discusses the Supreme Court aggressively filling its calendar with culture-war clashes, taking up fights over abortion, gay rights, guns, affirmative action and voting rights, at the behest of conservative advocates.

Olatunde Johnson, a professor at Columbia Law School, discusses President Biden's nomination of the first Black woman to the Supreme Court, Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson, and the road to her confirmation.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
